about_the_game: Add-on installment #3 includes the new playable character Mereoleona, as well as items such as the "Self-Made Wizard King" outfit for Asta, which he made in his zeal to become the Wizard King.
detailed_description: Add-on installment #3 includes the new playable character Mereoleona, as well as items such as the "Self-Made Wizard King" outfit for Asta, which he made in his zeal to become the Wizard King.
